title: Top Places to visit in Viluppuram, Tamil Nadu
content: Viluppuram (also Villupuram or Vizhupuram) is one of the 37 districts that make up the state of Tamil Nadu, India. It was founded on 30 September 1993, prior to which it was part of the Cuddalore district district. Viluppuram district lies between the national highways of Tiruchirappalli and Chen
